cs213.photoAlbum.model
Interface BackendInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Backend
public interface BackendInterface

This interface is used to store and fetch User data. The following interface contains method for saving a list of all users with their respective details, a load function to retrieve an Array List of current users, a function to retrieve data for a specific user, a function to add a new User, and a function to delete a User. This will implement Session Persistence.

Author:
dryu

 void addUser(User user)
          This method adds takes a User Object and adds it to the list of users.
 void deleteUser(java.lang.String id)
          This method deletes a user from the userList (HashMap) using the UserID as the key.
 User getUser(java.lang.String id)
          The getUser method finds a user according to their userID and returns the User object or null if the user cannot be found.
 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,User> getUserList()
          Returns the hashmap that contains the list of users.
 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,User> load()
          When this method is called, it will read the user.data file from the data folder, and use it populate the list of users and their data.
 void save(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,User> userList)
          When this method is called, it will save the data for the application.
 void setUserList(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,User> userList)
          Sets the hashmap that contains the list of users to the given hashmap.

When this method is called, it will save the data for the application. This includes the list of users, their albums, photos, and tags.
